itunes:title: Back to the Tree of Life – Tree of Life E8
itunes:author: jon collins, tim mackie
itunes:summary: Jesus often talks about the Kingdom of God like a garden. And in this Kingdom, Jesus saw himself as the tree at the center. Listen in as Tim and Jon discuss the life and parables of Jesus, as well as the future promise of a new Eden on the final pages of the Bible.
itunes:subtitle: Jesus often talks about the Kingdom of God like a garden. And in this Kingdom, Jesus saw himself as the tree at the center. Listen in as Tim and Jon discuss the life and parables of Jesus, as well as the future promise of a new Eden on the final pages of the Bible.
itunes:keywords: trees, jon collins, eden, christianity, bible, podcast, theology, tim mackie, garden of eden, tree of life, bible project, christian
